channel.title: Nvidia on shekhar's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Nvidia on shekhar's Blog

item.title: Setting up Nvidia SDK Manager and Torch Library in Jetson Board
item.description: Learn how to setup Nvidia SDK Manager to install latest jetpack in jetson development boards like Orion AGX, Nano Xavier. This blog also extent to setup tensorrt and do benchmark over existing Pytorch Model

item.title: Installing Cuda 12.x in Ubuntu 24.04
item.description: Learn how to install CUDA 12.2 on Ubuntu 24.04. Follow our step-by-step guide to set up NVIDIA drivers, CUDA Toolkit, and manage Python environments with Pyenv, Pipenv, and Poetry.
